title: more refunds?
body: Is there any chance I could get more refunds? Because I spent them very stupidly when I started the game.

replies.body: Currently, there is no method of obtaining more refund tokens beyond what is provided through our [refund guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).  Be extra wary about what you want to purchase as the tokens are there for accidental mistakes.  Feel free to reach out if you have any questions!
